page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES IN SOUTHALL
page.content: In our school we play{Bitthu.}We have two teams with normally four in each team. We play with a small ball and a pile of small flat stones. The stones are put in a pile in a circle. The teams stand opposite each other with the pile of stones in the centre. One person throws the ball at the pile of stones (if they miss three times a member of the opposite team has three shots) until the pile is knocked over. While they try to build up the pile, the other team tries to hit them by throwing the ball at them. The game either finishes when the pile is built and that team then shouts "Bitthu",or when all the team has been hit by the ball. ______________________ { Credits} Children who had no space for their name: D Bhalla,Surgit Panesar,H Sondh,Parmjeet Sidhu, Rachael Coulbeck, Satpal Kalsi
